channel.title: HTTPS support for avatars
channel.description:
sup lads, was just wondering if we could have https support for avatars so that those of us browsing using ssl don't get the insecure warning. imgur supports ssl but when it tried using the https url in my profile it wouldn't save.
I'm pretty sure it can be done by using // at the start of the URL and it'll use either http or https depending on the connection of the page. I guess it doesn't matter if some people don't use hosts that support ssl because then at least the warning will only happen on a few pages.
So yeah.. allowing https:// or just // should fix the problem! Thanks for reading boys.

item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I noticed this problem too, I’m probably just going to force people to upload avatars to my server so it can always be served with https.

edit:
I’ve removed all avatars, and made it so you must upload an avatar, it will speed things up along with being served over the correct channel.
